title: Juan Morillo (athlete)
text: Juan Alberto Morillo (born May 20, 1972) is a male <a href="track%20and%20field">track and field</a> <a href="Sportsperson">athlete</a> from <a href="Venezuela">Venezuela</a>. He competed for his native <a href="South%20America">South America</a>n country at the <a href="2000%20Summer%20Olympics">2000 Summer Olympics</a> in <a href="Sydney%2C%20Australia">Sydney, Australia</a>, where he was eliminated in the first round of the men's 4x100 metres relay, alongside <a href="Jos%C3%A9%20Carabal%C3%AD%20%28athlete%29">José Carabalí</a>, <a href="Hely%20Ollarves">Hely Ollarves</a>, and <a href="Jos%C3%A9%20Pe%C3%B1a%20%28sprinter%29">José Peña</a>.
